level.heading: List of most commonly used prescription drugs.
level.text: Thirty days prior to each issue date, the Department of Human Services shall furnish to the Office of Consumer Protection a list of the 100 most commonly used prescription drugs.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-805.51.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-114, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-804.51
